google_play_reviews.content: The data usage information is highly inaccurate. For example, I just downloaded a movie on Hotstar app which is 2.22GB in size. Please fix the data usage section or remove it as the information showing there is not correct.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Saswata,
We understand your issue and apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please be aware that the actual data used while downloading a file might differ from its size depending on the method used by the app. Also, make sure your data plan reset time is not interfering with the calculation.

Hope this helps,
Team Bitroid

google_play_reviews.content: It is an all right app - the widget doesn't work. What I am really looking for is a simple data useage display and an alarm once it is almost reached. I dont want up load / download speed, 7 days daily useage reports, wifi and net data rates etc. People over complicate things.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hey Wroger,
Refreshing the widget from the app or removing and re-adding the widget fixes the issue in most cases. If not, clearing the data of your system launcher might help. Also, live network speed, data rates etc. are optional features. You can see your data usage and set data alarms from within the app.

Hope this helps,
Team Bitroid

google_play_reviews.replyContent:

Thank you for the kind words. Data usage and Network speed are separated intentionally, as combining both would cause the icons to overlap. Which means you would either see the network speed or data usage percentage in the status bar, which is undesirable.

Hope this helps :)
Team Bitroid
